# Edward Bruce (archer)

| birth_place = Aurora, Illinois, U.S.

| club = Chicago Archers

Edward Malcolm Bruce (May 10, 1861 â€“ September 9, 1919) was an American archer. He competed in the men's double York round, men's double American round, and the men's team round at the 1904 Summer Olympics.
He died in Chicago on September 9, 1919.
